Review.Contenu: I always have ordered from you because of the shipping experience being so FANTASTIC!! It has gone down hill tremendously. It used to be 2 days to my house from you now it is taking a week. The package is sitting at your place with just the label created for about 2 days before it even leaves to USPS. Then after it leaves tracking never updates. Also I have asked EVERY SINGLE TIME to have my items shipped in a box to prevent damage and you never comply. So frustrating.

Review.Titre: No morals, cheapskates, will not stand behind their product.
Review.Contenu: I've been using ecigmafia for a couple years now and in the beginning I had a disposable device not work correctly and when I reached out to customer service they asked I send a video of the device malfunctioning which I did and they credited my account. Sometime later I had opened a device to find the inside of the bag it came in soaked in ejuice and the device was DOA. I emailed support and they gave me push back saying they aren't reaponsible for the product they sell and the device manufacturer is at fault and I would need to take it up with them. BUT they offered to do me a HUGE favor and repace the device after I paid for shipping and send the defective device back to then. I told them I would just eat the cost this time, attempting to be gracious. They ignored my response appearing less than grateful for my being reasonable or loyal. Since then I have had four more deivices I've had to throw in the trash as they arrived as described above. I haven't even bothered to deal with ecigmafia's cheapskate customer service. Spend hundreds on their site but then basically be accused of trying to commit fraud if I get a bad device and expect them to back up what they sell. I'll be seeing if there is a different vendor that values my patronage next time I shell out for 20+ devices per order. I'm disgusted with companies dodging resposibility and nickel and diming a person at every opportunity.

Review.Titre: The products are fine for the most…
Review.Contenu: The products are fine for the most part, but the team that answers the customer service email address are rude and condescending.  I had a warranty issue because I got three duds out of the 10 I ordered and the response that I received was "we have never had a problem with those".  Then I asked about getting charged for shipping and was explained that the "math was simple".  So, yeah...

Review.Titre: Still waiting for my order....
Review.Contenu: So I made an order Monday and tracked it and it's Saturday and still haven't received it. I've had a friend order multiple times from there and the previous order was done Sunday evening and was received Thursday. While tracking this order for one thing it sat at 1 post office for 3-4 days and today it finally showed up in Denver at 4:13am, yet somehow I still didn't receive it today. I know to cover yourselves you say it can be a week, but you're shipping 2-3 day Priority mail. Mail even delivers on Saturday. 5-6 shipping days and I still don't even know if I'll get it by next week. I'm not saying it's crazy for something to take 7 or more days, but I've order from other places before and if you order Monday you're definitely getting it by Friday. Considering you sent me this email a couple days ago asking to review my purchase. I assume it means you think I should have received the product by now to review it right? Pretty tough to do a review when I haven't received the product. I learned my lesson and most likely will try a site with more reliable delivery times. Lesson learned.

Review.Titre: Be Careful Your Information May Be Hacked
Review.Contenu: I received an email shortly after placing my ordering claiming to be from ECigMafia saying I didn't pay for my order correctly and had committed fraud.  That they were turning in over to the police.  I knew right away it was from a hacker.  They had my email, phone, and address.I contacted ECigMafia to let them know and within 10 minutes received a reply stating they were aware of it and were working on it.  This means they knew they had a hacker and didn't let the customers know ahead of time, to me that's terrible business.Then I didn't receive the correct amount of coils I ordered and was charged for.  Since the price wasn't very much I just let it go.They should have offered some sort of incentive to those customers whose accounts were hacked.  I won't be doing business with them anymore and I was a long time buyer from their site.

Review.Titre: Prompt Delivery but Customer Service is a No for me
Review.Contenu: Products were delivered promptly, but I had issues with one order. The glass was broken, so I requested a return or exchange. The return was canceled on their end, and I was not given any notice or feedback as to why. I would not have known it was canceled had I not logged in to check the status. So I initiated another return (within a week or 2 of receiving the order), and that refund status stayed open. Fast forward to today (months after last order) when I placed another order, I left a note saying I never received an update for that return and asked them to check on the return. I checked the status and it says canceled- granted this refund was requested months ago. The very least customer service could do was send an email telling me why they could not refund it- because they have communicated nothing to me regarding the refund or exchange I requested. So the customer service blows. It was only $13 but still...

Review.Titre: Horrible shipping time
I thought ecigmafia was a great store…
Review.Contenu: I thought ecigmafia was a great store but they sent me the wrong stuff. They also didn't give me my discount at checkout after I paid. I called them on it and all they did was give me a store credit meaning I had to buy even more stuff. So, finally I do and they send me not 1 but 4 packages of the wrong coils. I sent them photos and the receipt immediately when I got the order. I called after two business days of hearing nothing. They apologized and said they wanted to make things right. They knew of the mistake on my black Friday order which was a large order. They made several promises then as well. It took till the New Year to come in before even a quarter of that was set right. My brother and some other friends had ordered from them for several years and my brother called and talked to someone about everything and sent him pictures from black Friday and this last order as well. We have voicemail and countless emails about all of the mistakes. He said he was going to send the correct Freemax Mesh Coils. Great here we go again.  We were supposed to receive what we ordered 4 three coil packages of Freemax Double Mesh Coils 0.2ohm.. Instead we got three packages of0. 15 quad coils. None of us use that kind of wattage. Bottom line we were out well over $100.00 from black Friday and now instead of getting our 4 packages of 3 coils we got three of the wrong style and ohms and one completely empty. To make up for the Black Friday nightmare we were promised either 2 VooPoo Drag 2 Mod starter kits or two Vaporesso Gen Mod Devices. We haven't gotten our correct coils and since Black Friday No VooPoo Drag 2 kits both Ink or the Vaporesso Gen Mod Devices in Gold, black or silver. Not Kool, not professional and lied to over and over again.

Review.Titre: I have mixed feelings
Review.Contenu: I have mixed feelings. I placed a large order and they just cancelled it with no explanation. I had to send them 2 emails before they finally respond that they won’t ship to any address different from my credit card billing address. Why? I’m a travel nurse and my billing address is just a mailbox. I order online from many different sites all the time and have things shipped to wherever I happen to be at the moment. It’s not a problem with any other online merchant. They tell me I have to sign up and use Sezzle to ship somewhere else. How does using Sezzle change anything? So stupid and not great customer service. That being said, the prices seemed decent and my order arrived safe and sound finally.

I don't understand it because our mail from Atlanta comes straight here other than that everything has been top notch.

Review.Contenu: Great on shipping fast delivery coupon's don’t work they say not active would be nice to use one

Review.Titre: Multiple vapes ordered
Review.Contenu: I ordered several vapes the other day. As i only use them 1 at a time, i opened 1, it worked just fine...gave 1 to my daughter..it worked fine.  I decided to change up flavors about 5 days later. Open another one hit it and it would not stop firing. Finally got it to stop by blowing in it. Opened another one...it to would not stop firing...opened the 3rd one it too would not stop firing...finally opened the 4th one...it was working well...the 3 that arent working properly are Orion brand Lost Vapes...i contacted Ecigmafia...they emailed back and said because it was outside the 72 hour timeframe. There was nothing they could do about it.  I guess if you buy multiple vapes you should open them all as soon as you get them to make sure they work...to stay within the guidlines of the rules...my bad..i just expected to get a better quality and service from a big store like Ecigmafia...but i guess i shouldnt trust that either..wont happen again...

Review.Titre: Honestly terrible shipping
Review.Contenu: I've ordered from ecigmafia 4 or 5 times now, and I think only once did I get my order in a timely manner. Once I asked where my package was, and I was told that they don't work on weekends. From what I've seen, that means that Monday-Wednesday they are backed up on orders trying to fulfill them, and won't send your order from Friday-Monday out until at least Tuesday. Then, I live in Maryland, they are in Georgia, but for some reason every single time they ship my order to a Florida distribution center first, which is almost further away from Atlanta than my address. They basically send it in the exact opposite direction first, where I watch it sit for days sometimes. In general, it takes about 6-7 days to get my order, after being charged $9 to ship a $25 order. It's outrageous, I did not find the support helpful when I sent a ticket, and I think that this company needs to fix its shipping methods because they charge too much to give me too little and by the time my nicotine comes it's 3-4 days over the expected arrival time. Not okay considering the proximity of this company and how much they charge to ship.

Review.Titre: Good price. Long delivery.

I just didn't want to spend another hour ordering from somewhere else when it was already 3 days past when I needed to order something. 3 stars, only because of the prices on products.

Review.Titre: VooPoo Drag Q and customer Service review
Review.Contenu: First off, I really like the VooPoo Drag Q. Works as advertised and a great product once you get the hang of its unique abilities for an MTL. Holds a charge well and taste is good. Makes a funny "buzzing" sound right after a full charge for a little while, a sound I have not heard with my other vapes, but I don't believe it is a malfunction since it went away as the charge lowered over time.As far as the customer service, not happy. While I made the mistake of being in a hurry purchasing the vape, what caught my eye was the "Buy one get one free" so I purchased with coils and another pod but missed the little note stating, "Add 2 To Your Cart & One Will Be Free at Checkout". Long story short, only one arrived and when I contacted ECigMafia, I was basically told too bad since it shipped and all they could do was half refund or credit?! Seems to me as a repeat customer the customer service could have worked with me and sent the other even if I paid the shipping. Saving a couple bucks instead of making good on an advertisement to your customers would seem to be a smarter move as opposed to losing a customer.

Review.Titre: I'm happy with the new reduced cost of…
Review.Contenu: I'm happy with the new reduced cost of shipping, but upset at the change to tracking with Route. Before you could check the progress of your delivery on the Route website though it was very heavily trying to get you to use their app. Now they only have the option to to see where my package is at by downloading the app. It claims that it'll track all sorts of other companies packages but I order stuff online all the time from many different places and I've never came across any other company that uses it. I refuse to download yet another app that will most definitely gather all the information it can to sell to the highest bidder and make a profit that I'll only use a few times at most in a year, and I already had to pay a nominal fee to have it in the first place. Delivery of packages bought from a company already have federal guidelines that the onus is on the company that the goods be delivered to the purchaser in the United States so the added "insurance" is absolutely unnecessary and loosing the tracking feature without downloading the app is just 100% a free money grab that offers nothing of value to me anymore so I won't be purchasing the Route package insurance anymore. Other than that, ECigMafia has always provided great service and awesome prices, especially with the discount codes that they almost always have going, so I'll definitely continue to order from them in the future.

Review.Titre: Your offerings are quite comprehensive, but specifications missing.
Review.Contenu: Your offerings are quite comprehensive, and pricing is competitive, (5*) BUT:We've found the website (4*) could be organized to make choices easier; for example, we are using the SMOK NOVO 4's and the NOVO 4 Mini's, and finding the replacement parts is difficult.  It may help if the pods were described clearly as "For Novo 4 only", or "For NOVO 4 Mini only", and the same notations for the coils , e.g., "For NOVO 4 and NOVO 4 Mini"). Even better, like Amazon, show parts offerings together with main item ("buyers also purchased... ").  SMOK offers SO many similar products that choosing replacement parts is confusing.

Review.Titre: Initially I gave E-CigMafia a 1-star…
Review.Contenu: Initially I gave E-CigMafia a 1-star review because their delivery took much longer than expected. It's possible it was a one time occurrence and I will order from them again to see if that was the case. As far as the products received, website, and overall experience (pricing, products, etc.) I would give it 4-stars. My only reason for not giving it 5-stars is because while their pricing is great on disposables, majority of the time on the best deals they're either completely sold out or have 1 or 2 flavors that most people don't want. So a lot of times the really great deals are unavailable. But comparison pricing with BOGO specials on high end products is still very good and I'm happy with the products. I will definitely warn anyone about buying the cheap disposables that are -$5-10 and have a BOGO deal....they are trash 🗑. Like anything else you get what you pay for. I bought almost 40 cheap disposables foe the same price as 11 high end ones and I ended up tossing most of the cheap ones because of taste and the next day they gave you a sore throat....most likely I was paying money to allow China to slowly poison me.

The only reason I do not give 5 stars, and this is NOT just Ecigmafia, it goes for all three of the online shops that I have ordered from...they will only post positive reviews on items. If you leave a bad review on an item it will not go up on the website. Not sure if this is the company or they are outsourcing their reviews to someone else but it's a very shady practice and should be illegal. I quit leaving reviews on products because what's the point? Customers are being mislead.
